sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <v-app-bar app color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <!-- Burger menu icon -->
        <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
          <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <!-- Title -->
        <v-toolbar-title>{{ userName }}</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <!-- Logout button -->
        <v-btn icon @click="logout">
          <v-icon>mdi-logout</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>

      <!-- Sidebar -->
      <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item
            v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
            :key="index"
            @click="navigate(index)"
          >
            <v-list-item-action>
              <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-action>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

      <v-main>
        <v-col cols="12" style="max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto">
          <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="800">
            <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text">
              Upload PDF Files
            </v-card-title>
            <v-card-text>
              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="
                        pdfFiles['Solicitud de residencias profesionales']
                      "
                      label="Solicitud de residencias profesionales"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="pdfFiles['Carta de presentación']"
                      label="Carta de presentación"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="pdfFiles['Carta de aceptación']"
                      label="Carta de aceptación"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="pdfFiles['Cartilla IMSS']"
                      label="Cartilla IMSS"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="
                        pdfFiles['Oficio de Asignación de asesor interno']
                      "
                      label="Oficio de Asignación de asesor interno"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="pdfFiles['Anteproyecto']"
                      label="Anteproyecto"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="pdfFiles['Liberación de los 5 créditos']"
                      label="Liberación de los 5 créditos"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                  <v-card>
                    <v-file-input
                      v-model="pdfFiles['Liberación servicio social']"
                      label="Liberación servicio social"
                      accept=".pdf"
                    ></v-file-input>
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-divider class="my-4"></v-divider>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn
                color="blue darken-2"
                @click="submitForm"
                :disabled="!isFormValid"
              >
                Submit
              </v-btn>
              <v-btn color="primary" @click="downloadAllFiles"
                >Download All Files</v-btn
              >
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-main>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
// import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      userName: localStorage.getItem('userName'),
      pdfFiles: {
        'Solicitud de residencias profesionales': null,
        'Carta de presentación': null,
        'Carta de aceptación': null,
        'Cartilla IMSS': null,
        'Oficio de Asignación de asesor interno': null,
        Anteproyecto: null,
        'Liberación de los 5 créditos': null,
        'Liberación servicio social': null
      },
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: 'Proyecto', icon: 'mdi-folder-outline' },
        { title: 'Asesorias', icon: 'mdi-account-plus-outline' },
        { title: 'Archivos', icon: 'mdi-file-document-outline' }
      ],
      userId: localStorage.getItem('id') // Retrieve the user's name from localStorage
    }
  },
  computed: {
    isFormValid () {
      // Check if all file inputs have a PDF selected
      for (const key in this.pdfFiles) {
        if (!this.pdfFiles[key]) {
          return false
        }
      }
      return true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    navigate (index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push('/student')
          break
        case 1:
          this.$router.push('/student/asesorias')
          break
        case 2:
          this.$router.push('/student/archivos')
          break
        default:
          break
      }
    },
    logout () {
      // Logic to logout the user
      // For example, you can clear any user data or tokens stored in localStorage
      localStorage.removeItem('token')
      localStorage.removeItem('user')
      // Redirect the user to the login page
      this.$router.push('/login')
    },
    submitForm () {
      // Submit form logic, send files to the server
      // You can use Axios or any other method to send files to the server
    },
    downloadAllFiles () {
      // Download all files logic
      // You can generate a download link or use Axios to download files from the server
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i {
  color: white;
}
</style>
